name: nBricks
description:
A simple Breakout-style game. The game is not complete but I wanted people to be able to play it and let me know what you think. It is fully playable and I am working on new levels, bricks and balls. This is my first Unity game so I'm sure there are a lot of things I can improve on if you have suggestions please let me know.

Sound isn't broken, I currently don't have any in the game... Feel free to listen to music while playing.
